titles: Ane sermon preichit befoir the Regent and nobilitie vpon a part of the thrid chapter of the prophet Malachi, in the kirk of Leith, at the tyme of the Generall Assemblie on Sonday the 13. of Ianuarie. Anno. Do. 1571. Be Dauid Fergussone minister of the Euangell at Dunfermlyne.
author: Fergusson, David, d. 1598.
notes: Preached before James VI of Scotland.
Identified as STC 10820a on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
keywords: Bible. --  O.T. --  Malachi --  Commentaries --  Early works to 1800.
